results.title: Jackson Pollack, Aliens
results.content:
Jackson pollack was found in a tree this morning. No one knows how he got there or, even, that he was still living. One witness has been quoted saying, “I just looked up and he was there. I could spot a Jackson Pollack from a mile away.” The subject then turned and ran directly into an oncoming onslaught of squirrels.

Meanwhile Jackson started to preach about aliens and their “inevitable need to slay all but the most serendipitous.” His body quickly evaporated into thin air leaving a phone number to a Japanese family living in Bergen, Norway.

More to come on this developing story...

meta.description: Jackson Pollack found in a tree. Alien onslaught ensues.
meta.author: Issac Kelly
